title: Deadman armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Deadman armour is a set of cosmetic armour purchased from Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 160 Last Man Standing points per piece, costing a total of 480 points. Players can store a complete set of Deadman armour in the armour case of the costume room of their player-owned house.

content:
A player wearing Deadman armour.

Deadman armour is a set of cosmetic armour purchased from Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 160 Last Man Standing points per piece, costing a total of 480 points. Players can store a complete set of Deadman armour in the armour case of the costume room of their player-owned house.

In Deadman mode, it is obtained by using blood money on Nigel, costing 1 per piece totalling at 3 for the set. The armour pieces share their stats with a regular cape, iron platebody and platelegs. In order to purchase deadman armour in Deadman mode, players must use the blood money on Nigel, instead of speaking to him, as there are no dialogue options for purchasing the armour.
